{{Location Intro|The '''Forgotten Sword Cemetery'''|description=<p>{{If Self|Forgotten Sword Cemetery|It|The Forgotten Sword Cemetery}} is an important location within [[Dadaupa Gorge]], which witnessed the battle against the monsters of [[Khaenri'ah]]. It is protected by three layers of seal, which can be broken by activating three [[Elemental Monument]]s around Dadaupa Gorge's Hilichurl camps during the {{Quest|Break the Sword Cemetery Seal}}.}}
